price: 28. Ma aha abuuriddiinna iyo soo bixintiinnu idinkoo dhammi waxaan ahayn sida (abuuridda iyo soo bixinta) naf keliya. Hubaal Alle waa Wax kasta Maqle, wax kasta Arka.
arabic: مَّا خَلۡقُكُمۡ وَلَا بَعۡثُكُمۡ إِلَّا كَنَفۡسٖ وَٰحِدَةٍۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعُۢ بَصِيرٌ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: mā khalqukum walā baʿthukum illā kanafsin wāḥidatin inna al-laha samīʿun baṣīrun
